Posts.Content: Hi everyone, I am wondering if anyone can shed any light on my problem, I had a lumpectomy and reconstruction 12 days ago, drain out on 4th day, for the past three days I have had lots of swelling under right arm And right side of right breast, feels like it is moving up my chest, if it needs draining how will they do this? and does it hurt, I also have an infection at t junction of scar which I am on antibiotics for, my breast and arm is not red at all just swollen and hot. Any advice welcome. Thank you xx
Posts.Title: 12 day after surgery
